1: לַמְנַצֵּ֤חַ ׀ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> לְעֶ֥בֶד <sup>5650 </sup> <n>the servant</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>[A Psalm] of David</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> דִּבֶּ֨ר ׀ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>who spake</n> לַיהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דִּ֭בְרֵי <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the words</n> הַשִּׁירָ֣ה <sup>7892 </sup> <n>of this song</n> הַזֹּ֑את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>in</n> בְּי֤וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> הִֽצִּיל־ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>delivered</n> יְהוָ֘ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[that] the LORD</n> אוֹת֥וֹ <sup>853 </sup> מִכַּ֥ף <sup>3709 </sup> <n>him from the hand</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> אֹ֝יְבָ֗יו <sup>341 </sup> <n>of all his enemies</n> וּמִיַּ֥ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>and from the hand</n> שָׁאֽוּל׃ <sup>7586 </sup> <n>of Saul</n> וַיֹּאמַ֡ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> אֶרְחָמְךָ֖ <sup>7355 </sup> <n>I will love</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>thee O LORD</n> חִזְקִֽי׃ <sup>2391 </sup> <n>my strength</n>
2: יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> סַֽלְעִ֥י <sup>5553 </sup> <n>[is] my rock</n> וּמְצוּדָתִ֗י <sup>4686 </sup> <n>and my fortress</n> וּמְפַ֫לְטִ֥י <sup>6403 </sup> <n>and my deliverer</n> אֵלִ֣י <sup>410 </sup> <n>my God</n> צ֭וּרִי <sup>6697 </sup> <n>my strength</n> אֶֽחֱסֶה־ <sup>2620 </sup> <n>in whom I will trust</n> בּ֑וֹ מָֽגִנִּ֥י <sup>4043 </sup> <n>my buckler</n> וְקֶֽרֶן־ <sup>7161 </sup> <n>and the horn</n> יִ֝שְׁעִ֗י <sup>3468 </sup> <n>of my salvation</n> מִשְׂגַּבִּֽי׃ <sup>4869 </sup> <n>[and] my high tower</n>
3: מְ֭הֻלָּל <sup>1984 </sup> <n>[who is worthy] to be praised</n> אֶקְרָ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>I will call</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>upon the LORD</n> וּמִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> אֹ֝יְבַ֗י <sup>341 </sup> <n>from mine enemies</n> אִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>so shall I be saved</n>
4: אֲפָפ֥וּנִי <sup>661 </sup> <n>compassed</n> חֶבְלֵי־ <sup>2256 </sup> <n>The sorrows</n> מָ֑וֶת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>of death</n> וְֽנַחֲלֵ֖י <sup>5158 </sup> <n>me and the floods</n> בְלִיַּ֣עַל <sup>1100 </sup> <n>of ungodly men</n> יְבַֽעֲתֽוּנִי׃ <sup>1204 </sup> <n>made me afraid</n>
5: חֶבְלֵ֣י <sup>2256 </sup> <n>The sorrows</n> שְׁא֣וֹל <sup>7585 </sup> <n>of hell</n> סְבָב֑וּנִי <sup>5437 </sup> <n>compassed me about</n> קִ֝דְּמ֗וּנִי <sup>6923 </sup> <n>prevented</n> מ֣וֹקְשֵׁי <sup>4170 </sup> <n>the snares</n> מָֽוֶת׃ <sup>4194 </sup> <n>of death</n>

7: וַתִּגְעַ֬שׁ <sup>1607 </sup> <n>shook</n> וַתִּרְעַ֨שׁ ׀ <sup>7493 </sup> <n>and trembled</n> הָאָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>Then the earth</n> וּמוֹסְדֵ֣י <sup>4146 </sup> <n>the foundations</n> הָרִ֣ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>also of the hills</n> יִרְגָּ֑זוּ <sup>7264 </sup> <n>moved</n> וַ֝יִּתְגָּֽעֲשׁ֗וּ <sup>1607 </sup> <n>and were shaken</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> חָ֥רָה <sup>2734 </sup> <n>because he was wroth</n> לֽוֹ׃
8: עָ֘לָ֤ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>There went up</n> עָשָׁ֨ן ׀ <sup>6227 </sup> <n>a smoke</n> בְּאַפּ֗וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>out of his nostrils</n> וְאֵשׁ־ <sup>784 </sup> <n>and fire</n> מִפִּ֥יו <sup>6310 </sup> <n>out of his mouth</n> תֹּאכֵ֑ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>devoured</n> גֶּ֝חָלִ֗ים <sup>1513 </sup> <n>coals</n> בָּעֲר֥וּ <sup>1197 </sup> <n>were kindled</n> מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n>
9: וַיֵּ֣ט <sup>5186 </sup> <n>He bowed</n> שָׁ֭מַיִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>the heavens</n> וַיֵּרַ֑ד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>also and came down</n> וַ֝עֲרָפֶ֗ל <sup>6205 </sup> <n>and darkness</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> רַגְלָֽיו׃ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>[was] under his feet</n>
10: וַיִּרְכַּ֣ב <sup>7392 </sup> <n>And he rode</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> כְּ֭רוּב <sup>3742 </sup> <n>upon a cherub</n> וַיָּעֹ֑ף <sup>5774 </sup> <n>and did fly</n> וַ֝יֵּ֗דֶא <sup>1675 </sup> <n>yea he did fly</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> כַּנְפֵי־ <sup>3671 </sup> <n>upon the wings</n> רֽוּחַ׃ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>of the wind</n>
11: יָ֤שֶׁת <sup>7896 </sup> <n>He made</n> חֹ֨שֶׁךְ ׀ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>darkness</n> סִתְר֗וֹ <sup>5643 </sup> <n>his secret place</n> סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֥יו <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> סֻכָּת֑וֹ <sup>5521 </sup> <n>his pavilion</n> חֶשְׁכַת־ <sup>2824 </sup> <n>him [were] dark</n> מַ֝֗יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> עָבֵ֥י <sup>5645 </sup> <n>[and] thick clouds</n> שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <sup>7834 </sup> <n>of the skies</n>

13: וַיַּרְעֵ֬ם <sup>7481 </sup> <n>also thundered</n> בַּשָּׁמַ֨יִם ׀ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>in the heavens</n> יְֽהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> וְ֭עֶלְיוֹן <sup>5945 </sup> <n>and the Highest</n> יִתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>gave</n> קֹל֑וֹ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>his voice</n> בָּ֝רָ֗ד <sup>1259 </sup> <n>hail</n> וְגַֽחֲלֵי־ <sup>1513 </sup> <n>[stones] and coals</n> אֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>784 </sup> <n>of fire</n>

32: הָ֭אֵל <sup>410 </sup> <n>[It is] God</n> הַמְאַזְּרֵ֣נִי <sup>247 </sup> <n>that girdeth</n> חָ֑יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>me with strength</n> וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and maketh</n> תָּמִ֣ים <sup>8549 </sup> <n>perfect</n> דַּרְכִּֽי׃ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>my way</n>
33: מְשַׁוֶּ֣ה <sup>7737 </sup> <n>He maketh</n> רַ֭גְלַי <sup>7272 </sup> <n>my feet</n> כָּאַיָּל֑וֹת <sup>355 </sup> <n>like hinds'</n> וְעַ֥ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> בָּ֝מֹתַ֗י <sup>1116 </sup> <n>me upon my high places</n> יַעֲמִידֵֽנִי׃ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>[feet] and setteth</n>
34: מְלַמֵּ֣ד <sup>3925 </sup> <n>He teacheth</n> יָ֭דַי <sup>3027 </sup> <n>my hands</n> לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>to war</n> וְֽנִחֲתָ֥ה <sup>5181 </sup> <n>is broken</n> קֶֽשֶׁת־ <sup>7198 </sup> <n>so that a bow</n> נְ֝חוּשָׁ֗ה <sup>5154 </sup> <n>of steel</n> זְרוֹעֹתָֽי׃ <sup>2220 </sup> <n>by mine arms</n>
35: וַתִּתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Thou hast also given</n> לִי֮ מָגֵ֪ן <sup>4043 </sup> <n>me the shield</n> יִ֫שְׁעֶ֥ךָ <sup>3468 </sup> <n>of thy salvation</n> וִֽימִינְךָ֥ <sup>3225 </sup> <n>and thy right hand</n> תִסְעָדֵ֑נִי <sup>5582 </sup> <n>hath holden me up</n> וְֽעַנְוַתְךָ֥ <sup>6037 </sup> <n>and thy gentleness</n> תַרְבֵּֽנִי׃ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>hath made me great</n>
36: תַּרְחִ֣יב <sup>7337 </sup> <n>Thou hast enlarged</n> צַעֲדִ֣י <sup>6806 </sup> <n>my steps</n> תַחְתָּ֑י <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> מָ֝עֲד֗וּ <sup>4571 </sup> <n>did not slip</n> קַרְסֻלָּֽי׃ <sup>7166 </sup> <n>under me that my feet</n>
37: אֶרְדּ֣וֹף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>I have pursued</n> א֭וֹיְבַי <sup>341 </sup> <n>mine enemies</n> וְאַשִּׂיגֵ֑ם <sup>5381 </sup> <n>and overtaken</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> אָ֝שׁוּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>them neither did I turn again</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> כַּלּוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>till they were consumed</n>
38: אֶ֭מְחָצֵם <sup>4272 </sup> <n>I have wounded</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>were not</n> יֻ֣כְלוּ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>them that they were not able</n> ק֑וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>to rise</n> יִ֝פְּל֗וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>they are fallen</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> רַגְלָֽי׃ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>under my feet</n>
39: וַתְּאַזְּרֵ֣נִי <sup>247 </sup> <n>For thou hast girded</n> חַ֭יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>me with strength</n> לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>unto the battle</n> תַּכְרִ֖יעַ <sup>3766 </sup> <n>thou hast subdued</n> קָמַ֣י <sup>6965 </sup> <n>under me those that rose up</n> תַּחְתָּֽי׃ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n>
40: וְֽאֹיְבַ֗י <sup>341 </sup> <n>of mine enemies</n> נָתַ֣תָּה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Thou hast also given</n> לִּ֣י עֹ֑רֶף <sup>6203 </sup> <n>me the necks</n> וּ֝מְשַׂנְאַ֗י <sup>8130 </sup> <n>them that hate</n> אַצְמִיתֵֽם׃ <sup>6789 </sup> <n>that I might destroy</n>
41: יְשַׁוְּע֥וּ <sup>7768 </sup> <n>They cried</n> וְאֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> מוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>but [there was] none to save</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>to</n> יְ֝הוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[them even] unto the LORD</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> עָנָֽם׃ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>but he answered</n>
42: וְֽאֶשְׁחָקֵ֗ם <sup>7833 </sup> <n>Then did I beat</n> כְּעָפָ֥ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>them small as the dust</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> פְּנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> ר֑וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>the wind</n> כְּטִ֖יט <sup>2916 </sup> <n>as the dirt</n> חוּצ֣וֹת <sup>2351 </sup> <n>in the streets</n> אֲרִיקֵֽם׃ <sup>7324 </sup> <n>I did cast them out</n>
43: תְּפַלְּטֵנִי֮ <sup>6403 </sup> <n>Thou hast delivered</n> מֵרִ֪יבֵ֫י <sup>7379 </sup> <n>me from the strivings</n> עָ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> תְּ֭שִׂימֵנִי <sup>7760 </sup> <n>[and] thou hast made</n> לְרֹ֣אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>me the head</n> גּוֹיִ֑ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> עַ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>a people</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> יָדַ֣עְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[whom] I have not known</n> יַֽעַבְדֽוּנִי׃ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>shall serve</n>
44: לְשֵׁ֣מַֽע <sup>8088 </sup> <n>bruit</n> אֹ֭זֶן <sup>241 </sup> <n>they</n> יִשָּׁ֣מְעוּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>of me they shall obey</n> לִ֑י בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>afflicted</n> נֵ֝כָ֗ר <sup>5236 </sup> <n>alien</n> יְכַחֲשׁוּ־ <sup>3584 </sup> <n>shall submit</n> לִֽי׃
45: בְּנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>afflicted</n> נֵכָ֥ר <sup>5236 </sup> <n>alien</n> יִבֹּ֑לוּ <sup>5034 </sup> <n>shall fade away</n> וְ֝יַחְרְג֗וּ <sup>2727 </sup> <n>and be afraid</n> מִֽמִּסְגְּרֽוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>4526 </sup> <n>out of their close places</n>
46: חַי־ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>liveth</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> וּבָר֣וּךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>and blessed</n> צוּרִ֑י <sup>6697 </sup> <n>[be] my rock</n> וְ֝יָר֗וּם <sup>7311 </sup> <n>be exalted</n> אֱלוֹהֵ֥י <sup>433 </sup> <n>God</n> יִשְׁעִֽי׃ <sup>3468 </sup> <n>of my salvation</n>
47: הָאֵ֗ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>[It is] God</n> הַנּוֹתֵ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>executes</n> נְקָמ֣וֹת <sup>5360 </sup> <n>vengeance</n> לִ֑י וַיַּדְבֵּ֖ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>me and subdueth</n> עַמִּ֣ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> תַּחְתָּֽי׃ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n>
48: מְפַלְּטִ֗י <sup>6403 </sup> <n>He delivereth</n> מֵאֹ֫יְבָ֥י <sup>341 </sup> <n>me from mine enemies</n> אַ֣ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>Surely</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>above</n> קָ֭מַי <sup>6965 </sup> <n>above those that rise up</n> תְּרוֹמְמֵ֑נִי <sup>7311 </sup> <n>yea thou liftest me up</n> מֵאִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> חָ֝מָ֗ס <sup>2555 </sup> <n>me from the violent</n> תַּצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>against me thou hast delivered</n>
49: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֤ן ׀ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> אוֹדְךָ֖ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>Therefore will I give thanks</n> בַגּוֹיִ֥ם ׀ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the heathen</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto thee O LORD</n> וּלְשִׁמְךָ֥ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>unto thy name</n> אֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ <sup>2167 </sup> <n>and sing praises</n>
50: [מִגְדֹּל כ] (מַגְדִּיל֮ <sup>2167 </sup> <n>give praise</n> ק) יְשׁוּע֪וֹת <sup>3444 </sup> <n>deliverance</n> מַ֫לְכּ֥וֹ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>giveth he to his king</n> וְעֹ֤שֶׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and sheweth</n> חֶ֨סֶד ׀ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>mercy</n> לִמְשִׁיח֗וֹ <sup>4899 </sup> <n>to his anointed</n> לְדָוִ֥ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>to David</n> וּלְזַרְע֗וֹ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>and to his seed</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>for</n> עוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>evermore</n>
